law.catch_line: Each vendor shall complete, under oath, and file with the Comptroller a sales and use tax return:...

text.section:
Each vendor shall complete, under oath, and file with the Comptroller a sales and use tax return:
on or before the 20th day of the month that follows the month in which the vendor makes any retail sale or sale for use; and
for other periods and on other dates that the Comptroller specifies by regulation, including periods in which the vendor does not make any retail sale or sale for use.

If the Comptroller approves, a vendor engaging in more than 1 business in which the vendor makes retail sales or sales for use may file a consolidated return covering the activities of the businesses.
